title: Vase, "Model 3461", ca. 1934
medium: hand moulded glass set with fire-joined turquoise canes (mezza-filigrana), gold leaf inclusions,
markings: Acid etched on base: "Venini Murano Made in Italy"; Venini paper label on base
provenance:
[1]; 2013: acquired by Museum (from Glass Past [2])













[1] Previous owners in Milan and in New York are noted, but there is no other information.
[2] New York specialists and dealers in Italian 20th-century glass.
creditline: Museum purchase from the Members' Acquisitions Fund of Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum
description: Curvilinear body composed of fine turquoise canes in clear glass, with applied loop ring foot in clear glass inset with gold leaf.
